pipeline.name: create-matrix
pipeline.description: Use R to generate a dummy matrix tsv output file with two samples and two features.

task.script:
# Generate a dummy matrix tsv output file with two samples and two features. df <- data.frame(ID_REF=c("78495_at", "78383_at"), SampleA=c(10, 20), SampleB=c(30, 40)) write.table(df, file="${output.tsv}", sep="\t", qmethod="double", col.names=TRUE, row.names=FALSE)
if (nzchar("${myFeatureSet}") && substr("${myFeatureSet}", 1, 2) != "${") { # write output properties as a tab-separated name/value file # containing the feature annotation set name to import outProps = file(description="${pipeline, taskOutputParams}", open="w") cat(file=outProps, sep="", "name\tvalue\n") cat(file=outProps, sep="", "assay run property, featureSet\t", "${myFeatureSet}", "\n") flush(con=outProps) close(con=outProps) }
